title: Global Ban (rewrite only)
description:
This cog is highly dangerous and requires you to edit code to use.
It gives you the ability to ban a usr from all servers that you have ban permissions on and also blocks that user locally.

commands.mass|global <ban|unban>: Allows several actions to be applied on multiple guilds.
commands.profile|pro [uid]: Shows profile information for the selected user.
commands.finduser|fu [user]: Debug command. Checks if we could find the user you're searching for.
commands.block [uid]: Blocks the user id you provide.
commands.unblock [uid]: Unblocks the user id you provide.

author: Bluscream#2597
